name: @garygrossgarten/ngx-tailwind
description: Add tailwind to an Angular Workspace

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && cd angular-workspace && schematics ..:ng-add
scripts.start: npm run build && cd angular-workspace && schematics ..:ng-add --debug false --tailwindVersion 1.9.5 --ngxBuildPlusVersion 10.1.1 --postcssImportVersion 12.0.1 --postcssLoaderVersion 4.0.4 --postcssScssVersion 3.0.2

author: Gary Gro√ügarten
